function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Computer vision-based monitoring without privacy protection","Impact":"Invasion of privacy, ethical concerns, and potential backlash from monitored individuals","Mitigation":"Implement privacy protection measures, maintain transparency, and obtain consent from individuals being monitored","Technologies":"Privacy protection technologies, encryption, consent management systems","People":"Workers, individuals being monitored","Owner":"Researchers, organizations implementing the monitoring system"},{"Description":"Lack of statistical analysis and deployment direction for social distancing monitoring approach","Impact":"Inaccurate results, ineffective implementation, and potential misuse of the monitoring system","Mitigation":"Conduct thorough statistical analysis, provide clear deployment guidelines, and ensure ethical use of the monitoring system","Technologies":"Statistical analysis tools, deployment frameworks, ethical guidelines","People":"Researchers, developers, organizations","Owner":"Research teams, developers, organizations implementing the monitoring system"},{"Description":"Development of mass video surveillance system without clear ethical guidelines","Impact":"Violation of privacy, potential misuse of data, and public distrust","Mitigation":"Establish clear ethical guidelines, obtain consent for surveillance, and ensure data protection measures are in place","Technologies":"Ethical guidelines frameworks, data protection technologies, consent management systems","People":"General public, individuals under surveillance","Owner":"Organizations implementing the surveillance system"}]}
